title: Expenditure on beer in the United Kingdom 2005 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Expenditure in million GBP. In total the number of data points it has is 14.
In general Expenditure in million GBP has rose over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Expenditure in million GBP, about 5631.0 was reported at Year 2018
The lowest Expenditure in million GBP, of value 3677.0 was reported at Year 2008
